author: DarwinJS
body:
This is likely related to #2881 - perhaps the reason that it was necessary to create a separate component for the icon?

Would be nice to have it compiled right in so that normal windows icon behaviors are observed (shortcut creation, visual identification in file system, etc).

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It seems this is still not supported dotnet/cli#3267

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: See discussion in #5013 for some of the findings

title: Please compile PowerShell icon into powershell.exe for Windows binary
